cyclone.name: CINDY
cyclone.current_location: about 135 mi south of Lake Charles, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: moving northwest toward the southeast Texas–southwest Louisiana coast, then forecast to arc northeast across the lower Mississippi Valley, Tennessee Valley and Ohio Valley late week

weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from San Luis Pass, TX to the mouth of the Mississippi River
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central Texas coast eastward to the western Florida Panhandle
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None (no Virginia locations listed in wind-probability table)
weather_observation.wind: Minimal winds expected, well below tropical-storm force at the Virginia coast
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along the Virginia coast
weather_observation.rainfall: Remnant moisture could bring 1–2 inches of rain late weekend, with brief heavier pockets possible
weather_observation.other_hazards: Localized flooding of low-lying or poorly drained areas possible if heavy showers move through
